com.microsoft.azure.management.eventhub

Interface EventHubDisasterRecoveryPairing.Update

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Appliable<EventHubDisasterRecoveryPairing>, EventHubDisasterRecoveryPairing.UpdateStages.WithSecondaryNamespace, Indexable
    Enclosing interface:

public static interface EventHubDisasterRecoveryPairing.Update
extends EventHubDisasterRecoveryPairing.UpdateStages.WithSecondaryNamespace, Appliable<EventHubDisasterRecoveryPairing>
    The template for a disaster recovery pairing update operation, containing all the settings that can be modified.
